title: ‘Still Growing Together,’ a Teenage Crush Leads to Marriage
description: Brittney Adu was smitten when she saw Aaron Canales on the first day of their freshman year of high school. Despite their cultural differences and the trials of a young romance, their love endured.
dc:creator: Tammy La Gorce
media:credit: Whitten Sabbatini for The New York Times
media:description: Brittney Adu said she felt like the “president of the entire world” when Aaron Canales asked her to be his girlfriend in 2013. The couple married Sept. 17 at the Lichterman Nature Center in Memphis.
